tool_description: Calculates method detection limits and quantification limits for analytical instruments based on blank measurements and instrumental parameters.

analytical_method.description: Analytical method: XRF, ICP_MS, ICP_AES, or AA

target_elements.description: Elements for which to calculate detection limits

error_messages: Invalid analytical_method: Use one of [XRF, ICP_MS, ICP_AES, AA].
Insufficient blank measurements: At least 7 blank measurements are required for reliable statistics.
Invalid elements: Provide valid chemical element symbols.
Negative blank values: Blank measurements cannot be negative.
usage: Provide analytical_method, target_elements, and blank_measurements; optionally set confidence_level. The tool calculates detection and quantification limits.

detection_limits.description: Method detection limits for each element with units

quantification_limits.description: Method quantification limits for each element with units
